meanings.definition: In a manner that is controlled by a thermostat.
meanings.sent1: The heater turned on thermostatically when the room got too cold.
meanings.sent2: The air conditioner adjusted thermostatically to maintain a comfortable temperature.
meanings.sent3: The toaster popped up thermostatically when the bread was perfectly browned.
meanings.sent4: The lights dimmed thermostatically as the evening progressed.
meanings.sent5: The car's engine fan kicked in thermostatically to prevent overheating.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a thermostat.
meanings.sent1: The thermostatically controlled oven baked the cookies evenly.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the thermostatically controlled shower to the right temperature.
meanings.sent3: The thermostatically linked devices communicated seamlessly.
meanings.sent4: The thermostatically regulated room stayed cozy throughout the night.
meanings.sent5: The thermostatically monitored fridge kept the food fresh for longer.

meanings.sent1: The thermostatically controlled car maintained a consistent cabin temperature.
meanings.sent2: The thermostatically operated greenhouse adjusted to the changing weather.
meanings.sent3: The thermostatically managed pool heater kept the water warm.
meanings.sent4: The thermostatically regulated thermostat saved energy by optimizing usage.
meanings.sent5: The thermostatically adjusted thermostat prevented the room from getting too hot.
